html: Wednesday Wonders Presents: Recordings of Houdini’s Water Torture Cell Speech! Recorded in 1914 by Thomas Edison, these wax cylinders are the only known copies of Houdini’s voice. #WednesdayWonders #DavidCopperfield #MODC #DCMuseum #Houdini #Edison #Inspire #Magicpic.twitter.com/eQV1sSZZT9

html: Got to go up on stage & see @D_Copperfield disappear right in front of me tonight... such a sweet experience! Also, still amazed at the fact you made a car, spaceship, & motorcycle appear out of thin air???Truly amazing! Thanks for a great show!
text: Got to go up on stage & see @D_Copperfield disappear right in front of me tonight... such a sweet experience! Also, still amazed at the fact you made a car, spaceship, & motorcycle appear out of thin air???Truly amazing! Thanks for a great show!

html: Just saw @D_Copperfield live in Vegas and all I can say is WILD. Cars appearing in the theater, a flying spaceship, and a T-Rex all in one show. This man makes you truly believe in Magic!
text: Just saw @D_Copperfield  live in Vegas and all I can say is WILD. Cars appearing in the theater, a flying spaceship, and a T-Rex all in one show. This man makes you truly believe in Magic!

html: @D_Copperfield Came from the UK to see your show in Vegas. Jaw dropping show man, thanks. End to end entertainment - thanks for making our break so special. My daughter wants to meet Blu now! Thanks again DC!

html: So saddened by the passing of our dear friend Joel Robuchon. Beyond his genius and incredible talent, he was one of the kindest man in the world. We will miss him greatly. Thinking about the people that were close to him today sending all our love pic.twitter.com/jZhWXvut2X
text: So saddened by the passing of our dear friend Joel Robuchon. Beyond his genius and incredible talent, he was one of the kindest man in the world. We will miss him greatly. Thinking about the people that were close to him today sending all our love pic.twitter.com/jZhWXvut2X

html: Caught @D_Copperfield show from 2nd Row tonight after ~5 years ... phenomenal technology and storytelling! Great to catch up with the great DC ... guy is never satisfied if it is not ground-breaking. Thank you, David!
text: Caught @D_Copperfield show from 2nd Row tonight after ~5 years ... phenomenal technology and storytelling!  Great to catch up with the great DC ... guy is never satisfied if it is not ground-breaking.  Thank you, David!

html: July marks Howard Thurston’s birthday. Thurston became the most famous magician of his time. You can now see some of Thurston’s pieces at the New York Historical Society’s, Summer of Magic exhibit. Don’t miss it! Ends September 16th. #WednesdayWonderspic.twitter.com/VYsXF5rAhz
text: July marks Howard Thurston’s birthday. Thurston became the most famous magician of his time. You can now see some of Thurston’s pieces at the New York Historical Society’s, Summer of Magic exhibit. Don’t miss it! Ends September 16th. #WednesdayWonderspic.twitter.com/VYsXF5rAhz

html: “The Discoverie of Witchcraft” was published by Reginald Scot in 1584. This 1st edition is rare because many copies were burned under James 1 in 1603.pic.twitter.com/OCbqiEzjca
text: “The Discoverie of Witchcraft” was published by Reginald Scot in 1584. This 1st edition is rare because many copies were burned under James 1 in 1603.pic.twitter.com/OCbqiEzjca

html: “Mr Electric”- Marvyn Roy would produce lightbulbs from his mouth with his lovely wife Carol. Carol assisted in many of Marvyn’s illusions including magically appearing in a giant light bulb. #WednesdayWonderspic.twitter.com/cyDwvM6IdA
text: “Mr Electric”- Marvyn Roy would produce lightbulbs from his mouth with his lovely wife Carol. Carol assisted in many of Marvyn’s illusions including magically appearing in a giant light bulb. #WednesdayWonderspic.twitter.com/cyDwvM6IdA

html: Last week I was in New York City to help debut the New York Historical Society's, Summer of Magic! It's an honor to help share some of the rich history of magic with the world! Check out a few moments from opening weekend. https://www.instagram.com/p/BkPVGwog2Uk/?taken-by=d_copperfield …
text:
Last week I was in New York City to help debut the New York Historical Society's, Summer of Magic! It's an honor to help share some of the rich history of magic with the world! Check out a few moments from opening weekend. 
https://www.instagram.com/p/BkPVGwog2Uk/?taken-by=d_copperfield …

html: Had an absolutely wonderful time this weekend welcoming @D_Copperfield to the Museum for a great program with @MarkPocan. A huge thanks to both for being with us to kick off our #SummerofMagic! html: Wonderful day yesterday welcoming the great @D_Copperfield to the Museum to open our new exhibition “Summer of Magic: Treasures from the David Copperfield Collection”! Join us to explore the Golden Age of Magic. Learn more at http://nyhistory.org/magic . #SummerofMagicpic.twitter.com/dEBcKh1bik
text: Wonderful day yesterday welcoming the great @D_Copperfield to the Museum to open our new exhibition “Summer of Magic: Treasures from the David Copperfield Collection”! html: Tune in my Instalive & Facebook live tomorrow at 7pm Est to watch my talk with my friend congressman @repmarkpocan about my journey through Magic. Visit my #SummerOfMagic exhibit with @nyhistory from June 15th to September 16thpic.twitter.com/kOZ2GlV2hD

html: This Saturday, join me at @NYHistory's 'Summer of Magic' as I sit down with Congressman Mark Pocan to discuss my personal journey in magic - and the role of magic in the modern world. Tickets: http://www.nyhistory.org/programs/evening-david-copperfield …pic.twitter.com/SdqMzLdwaU
